bind.calculate: concat( concat( /over_five_assessment/patient_age_in_years , if( /over_five_assessment/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')), concat( /over_five_assessment/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /over_five_assessment/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')) )

if( /over_five_assessment/needs_general_danger_signs_referral ='true' or /over_five_assessment/needs_general_signs_symptoms_referral ='true' or selected( /over_five_assessment/assessment/symptoms , 'cough_of_any_duration') or /over_five_assessment/needs_fever_referral ='true' or /over_five_assessment/needs_malaria_referral ='true' or /over_five_assessment/needs_tb_referral ='true' or /over_five_assessment/needs_diarrhoea_referral ='true' or /over_five_assessment/needs_diabetes_referral ='true' or /over_five_assessment/needs_hypertension_referral ='true' or /over_five_assessment/needs_mental_health_referral ='true' or /over_five_assessment/needs_sgbv_referral ='true', 'yes', 'no')

bind.relevant: /over_five_assessment/needs_general_danger_signs_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_general_signs_symptoms_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_fever_referral = 'false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_diarrhoea_referral = 'false' and selected( /over_five_assessment/assessment/symptoms , 'fever') and /over_five_assessment/assessment/is_sick ='yes'

bind.jr:constraintMsg: None cannot be selected with any other option!
Diarrhoea duration should be within a month(1-30 days)
You cannot select 'None' with other options
Please confirm the systolic blood pressure
Please confirm the diastolic blood pressure

bind.calculate: if(number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/systolic_blood_pressure ) <=90 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/diastolic_blood_pressure ) <=60, 'LOW', if(number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/systolic_blood_pressure ) > 90 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/systolic_blood_pressure ) < 140 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/diastolic_blood_pressure ) > 60 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/diastolic_blood_pressure ) <90, 'NORMAL', if(number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/systolic_blood_pressure ) >= 140 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/diastolic_blood_pressure ) >= 90, 'HIGH', 'INDETERMINATE')))

if(number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/systolic_blood_pressure ) <=90 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/diastolic_blood_pressure ) <=60, 'red', if(number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/systolic_blood_pressure ) > 90 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/systolic_blood_pressure ) < 140 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/diastolic_blood_pressure ) > 60 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/diastolic_blood_pressure ) <90, 'green', if(number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/systolic_blood_pressure ) >= 140 and number( /over_five_assessment/group_hypertension/diastolic_blood_pressure ) >= 90, 'red', 'orange')))

bind.relevant: /over_five_assessment/is_pregnant ='false' and /over_five_assessment/is_in_pnc ='false' and /over_five_assessment/patient_age_in_years >=18 and /over_five_assessment/needs_general_danger_signs_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_general_signs_symptoms_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_fever_referral = 'false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_diarrhoea_referral = 'false'

bind.jr:constraintMsg: None cannot be selected with any other option!
None cannot be selected with any other option!

bind.relevant: selected( /over_five_assessment/assessment/symptoms , 'cough_of_any_duration') and /over_five_assessment/group_tb/is_on_tb_treatment != '' and ( /over_five_assessment/needs_general_danger_signs_referral ='false' or /over_five_assessment/needs_fever_referral ='false' or /over_five_assessment/needs_diarrhoea_referral ='false') and /over_five_assessment/assessment/is_sick ='yes'

( /over_five_assessment/patient_age_in_years >=5 and /over_five_assessment/needs_general_danger_signs_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_general_signs_symptoms_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/group_diabetes/is_diabetic !='' and /over_five_assessment/needs_fever_referral = 'false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_diarrhoea_referral = 'false') or /over_five_assessment/is_sub_diabetic = 'true'

( /over_five_assessment/group_diabetes/is_diabetic !='' and /over_five_assessment/needs_general_danger_signs_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_general_signs_symptoms_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/group_diabetes/is_diabetic !='' and /over_five_assessment/needs_fever_referral = 'false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_diarrhoea_referral = 'false' and /over_five_assessment/patient_age_in_years >=5)

/over_five_assessment/is_pregnant ='false' and /over_five_assessment/is_in_pnc ='false' and /over_five_assessment/patient_age_in_years >=18 and (count-selected( /over_five_assessment/group_mental_health/mental_signs ) > 0 or count-selected( /over_five_assessment/group_mental_health/observed_mental_signs ) > 0) and /over_five_assessment/needs_general_danger_signs_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_fever_referral ='false' and /over_five_assessment/needs_diarrhoea_referral ='false'

selected( /over_five_assessment/group_mental_health/mental_signs , 'none') or selected( /over_five_assessment/group_mental_health/observed_mental_signs , 'none') and /over_five_assessment/is_pregnant ='false' and /over_five_assessment/is_in_pnc ='false' and /over_five_assessment/patient_age_in_years >=18

• Soothe the throat and releave the cough with a safe home remedy eg (warm fluids, warm lemon water with honey)
  • Advise the caregiver to increase fluids.
  • Advise the caregiver not to give any drugs to the child for this condition.
  • Advise the caregiver when to go to the health facility immediately.

Give 2 tablets of AL as per the instructions for 3 days. A total of 12 tablets.

Give two tablets of AL immediately

Give the second dose after 8 hours.

Give the third dose 24 hours after the first dose and subsequent doses every 12 hours until completion of the doses.

Give 3 tablets of AL as per the instructions for 3 days. A total of 18 tablets.

Give two tablets of AL immediately

Give the second dose after 8 hours.

Give the third dose 24 hours after the first dose and subsequent doses every 12 hours until completion of the doses.

Give 4 tablets of AL as per the instructions for 3 days. A total of 24 tablets.

Give two tablets of AL immediately

Give the second dose after 8 hours.

Give the third dose 24 hours after the first dose and subsequent doses every 12 hours until completion of the doses.

Advice the care giver to give:

2nd dose 8hours after the first dose

3rd dose 24hours after the first dose(same time the 1st dose was given)

4th dose 12hours from the 3rd dose

5th dose 12hours from the 4th dose and

6th dose 12hours from the 5th dose
Remind the caregiver to give the full dose as recommended

1. Paracetamol Syrup (120mg/5ml)

2. Paracetamol Syrup (250mg/5ml)

3. Paracetamol Tablets (500mg)

**Syrup Dosage**

  • Give Paracetamol Syrup (120mg/5ml) 10 ml Max 4 times in 24 hours
  • Give Paracetamol Syrup (250mg/5ml) 5ml Max 4 times in 24 hours
  • Give Paracetamol Syrup (250mg/5ml) 7.5ml Max 4 times in 24 hrs

**Tablet Dosage**

  • Give Paracetamol tablet 250mg
  • Give Paracetamol tablet 375mg
  • Give Paracetamol tablet 500mg
  • Give Paracetamol tablet 750mg
How many tablets of Paracetamol did you give?
Help the caregiver give first dose of paracetamol now. Advice the caregiver to give the full dose as recommended
**Advice to the Caregiver For All Persons Managed at Home **
Advise caregiver to give more fluids and continue feeding.
Advise on when to return. Go to nearest health facility immediately or if not possible return if child: becomes sicker, has blood in the stool.
Advise caregiver on use of a bednet (LLITN).
Give First Dose for Treatment Management

• Begin giving ORS solution right away.
  • Give first dose of Zinc
